content.d: Great job. Aqours members sure have a lot of stamina. You even managed to dash up these stairs.
...You’re out of breath, huh? Are you alright? Want some water?
I’m fine! As the fallen angel Yohane, I can transform the power seeping from the earth into dark magic and imbue it upon myself...... Cough!
That’s what happens when you talk too much when you’re out of breath...
Ugh~! These stair dashes are so tough! What’s with the angle of these stairs?! I can’t believe we have to dash up those!
Huh? Eli, do you find it unbelievable too?
Well, it doesn’t seem like a normal staircase to dash up... that’s for sure.
Fufu, what do you take me for? Of course, I think it’s tough too. But I feel that the more we do it, the stronger we’ll become. That’s why we have to keep going.
Here, drink some water. Once we rest a bit, we’ll do one last dash.
